issue.title: [Python] Fails to convert pytz.utc with versions 2018.3 and earlier
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4055](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4055). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
pytz.UTC is only a subclass of BaseTzInfo starting from pytz 2018.4 (https://launchpad.net/pytz/+announcement/14962), so with older versions of pytz there are failures in the tests

see: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2975#discussion-diff-239794078L969
